DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot study is to generate preliminary data regarding the skeletal effects of age-related changes in calcium and vitamin D metabolism in older men.
DOC.brief_title: Age Related Changes in Calciotropic Hormones and Their Impact on Male Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: healthy men age 50 yrs and older smokers known history of metabolic bone disease, known history of hypogonadism or renal insufficiency.
